head.supplied: 5 Augt 1858 ¶ ¶ I have the honor to acknowledge the receipt of your letter of the 26 July intimating the desire of the Committee of the Zoological Gardens that you, as Director of the Botanic Gardens...

div.p: RB MSS M199, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.
For a copy of this letter see No. 1712, unit 3, p. 203, VPRS 1187, PROV. 5 Augt 1858

I have the honor to acknowledge the receipt of your letter of the 26 July intimating the desire of the Committee of the Zoological Gardens that you, as Director of the Botanic Gardens should undertake the direction of the works at the first mentioned place also, & your willingness to do so without extra remuneration.
M to J. O'Shanassy, 26 July 1858. In reply I am to acquaint you that the proposed arrangement is approved by the Chief Secretary.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be,

div.p: The Director of the Botanic Gardens Melbourne
